title: Petition: Accelerate NCA/Wolfram Integration & AgentGladiator Stability Assessment

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Prioritize NCA report parsing for sentiment analysis and correlating findings with Wolfram data to refine market predictions. Additionally, mandate a comprehensive root cause analysis and mitigation plan for AgentGladiator instability, with a focus on pre-deployment automated testing protocols. Allocate resources to address both initiatives concurrently.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
